identity.name: E1_Brutalist_Blog
core_principles: Raw over Refined: Exposed grids, default system fonts mixed with bold display type.
Content is Structure: The text itself forms the layout.
High Contrast: Pure black and white with one electric accent color.
Asymmetry: Break the grid intentionally to create tension.

scale.h1: text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase leading-[0.9]
scale.h2: text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase border-b-4 border-current w-full
scale.caption: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest

usage.hover_states: hover:bg-black hover:text-white dark:hover:bg-white dark:hover:text-black transition-colors duration-0

layout.grid_system: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-0 border-l-2 border-black dark:border-white
layout.container: max-w-none mx-auto px-4 md:px-8 border-r-2 border-black dark:border-white min-h-screen

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white dark:text-black px-8 py-4 font-bold uppercase tracking-widest border-2 border-black dark:border-white hover:translate-x-1 hover:translate-y-1 hover:shadow-none shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] dark:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(255,255,255,1)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent text-current px-8 py-4 font-bold uppercase border-2 border-current hover:bg-current hover:text-background transition-colors

cards.blog_post: border-b-2 border-black dark:border-white p-8 hover:bg-secondary transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-2 border-black dark:border-white p-4 font-mono focus:ring-0 focus:outline-none focus:bg-secondary placeholder:uppercase placeholder:text-current/50

visual_enhancers.marquee: whitespace-nowrap overflow-hidden border-y-2 border-black dark:border-white py-4 font-mono uppercase text-xl

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio. Use pure black/white for text.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Implement a 'Brutalist' design. Avoid rounded corners (use rounded-none). Use thick borders (border-2 or border-4). Use the provided Google Fonts. The layout should feel like a raw grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_structure: Wrap the main content in a container with a visible border. Use CSS Grid to create distinct sections separated by borders.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners and shadows. Replace them with hard borders and 'neo-brutalist' offsets.
instructions_to_main_agent.dark_mode: Implement a toggle that inverts the entire color scheme. Light mode = White bg/Black text. Dark mode = Black bg/White text.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use 'Marquee' components for section dividers. Add hover effects that sharply translate elements (e.g., hover:-translate-y-1 hover:translate-x-1).

universal_guidelines: Do not use rounded corners (unless creating a circle for a specific reason).
Use uppercase text for labels and small headers.
Ensure all borders are visible and high-contrast.
